channel.title: Xampp PhpMyAdmin not working
channel.description: I can't load up my phpmyadmin anymore. I haven't used it in a while. This is on Ubuntu 11.04, using 1.7.1 v xampp. I get [code]This webpage is not available The webpage at http://localhost/phpmyadmin might be temporarily down or it may have moved permanently to a new web address. [/code]It asks for the username and password, and I type it in correctly and it goes there. [b]EDIT:[/b] I get this in the error log [code][Sun May 01 21:11:54 2011] [error] [client 127.0.0.1] user root not found: /phpmyadmin[/code] How is root not found, when that's what I use as the username for my highscores?

item.title: Xampp PhpMyAdmin not working
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

[quote=“Muroth, post:4, topic:393477”]My mysql directory is:
C:\wamp\bin\mysql[/quote]
I’m using Linux Ubuntu.

Read full topic

item.title: Xampp PhpMyAdmin not working
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

[quote=“Muroth, post:2, topic:393477”]Check your firewalls

if nothing, try restarting all services, re-installing phpmyadmin, make sure it’s the lastest version.[/quote]
Why check firewalls if my highscores work? I’ve restarted everything, and even my computer. I’m thinking about re-installing, but I don’t know where my mysql db’s are.

Read full topic

item.title: Xampp PhpMyAdmin not working

item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

Check your firewalls

if nothing, try restarting all services, re-installing phpmyadmin, make sure it’s the lastest version.

item.title: Xampp PhpMyAdmin not working
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

I can’t load up my phpmyadmin anymore. I haven’t used it in a while. This is on Ubuntu 11.04, using 1.7.1 v xampp. I get This webpage is not available The webpage at http://localhost/phpmyadmin might be temporarily down or it may have moved permanently to a new web address. It asks for the username and password, and I type it in correctly and it goes there.
EDIT: I get this in the error log [Sun May 01 21:11:54 2011] [error] [client 127.0.0.1] user root not found: /phpmyadmin How is root not found, when that’s what I use as the username for my highscores?

Read full topic
